import
nl.jworks.amasun.fitnesse.book
nl.jworks.amasun.fitnesse.solution
nl.jworks.guide
nl.jworks.presentation

Functionality - Apply Discount Coupon



Our marketing team wants to lure new customers to our website by advertising with discount coupons. The marketing team must be able to register coupon codes, along with a discount percentage. When the customer selects a valid discount code, the related discount percentage should be applied to the order.

Exercise



1. Implement this functionality in an ATDD fashion, first create the specs, then the testfixtures and finally implement the functionality itself.

Register Coupon
coupon code discount percentage
ErikPragt 10

Create Customer Order
customer name order total
Kees ABCD-12 100

script buy product scenario Could not invoke constructor for BuyProductScenario[1] Kees The instance scriptTableActor. does not exist
customer places order The instance scriptTableActor. does not exist ABCD-12 with total amount 100
customer applies discount coupon The instance scriptTableActor. does not exist ErikPragt
check total order price 90 The instance scriptTableActor. does not exist
